name: Toy Car Mini Golf Free: 3D Sports Game
name_original: Toy Car Mini Golf Free: 3D Sports Game
description:
Control a car with remote to drag a ball; aiming to drop the ball in a hole with the flag in it, go across miniature golf track with in a room environment.

Complete all 20 holes, and see if you score the best in this fun miniature mini golf game. In full 3D and with beautiful room environment, enjoy putting the golf ball in a hole; in this obstacle based mini golf.

Game Features:
- Drag ball aiming hole with an RC Toy Car
- Dodge obstacles to successful hole
- The lush 3D visuals are great on the eyes
- Beautiful 3D cartoon illustrated Room environment
- Miniature Golf tracks in a room
- Control the in any direction with control on left
- Realistic physics and ball movement
- User friendly navigation

Let's play Golf, become a Golf Star indoor, be a master and be a champion of miniature "Toy Car Mini Golf 3D"
